verses.verse: לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> no יִ֠הְיֶה <S%H1961><s%> shall have לַכֹּהֲנִ֨ים <S%H3548><s%> The priests הַלְוִיִּ֜ם <S%H3881><s%> the Levites כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> the whole שֵׁ֧בֶט <S%H7626><s%> [and] all the tribe לֵוִ֛י <S%H3878><s%> of Levi חֵ֥לֶק <S%H2506><s%> shall have no part וְנַחֲלָ֖ה <S%H5159><s%> nor inheritance עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> with Israel אִשֵּׁ֧י <S%H801><s%> made by fire יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וְנַחֲלָת֖וֹ <S%H5159><s%> and his inheritance יֹאכֵלֽוּן׃ <S%H398><s%> they shall eat

וְנַחֲלָ֥ה <S%H5159><s%> Therefore shall they have no inheritance לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> no יִֽהְיֶה־ <S%H1961><s%> shall have לּ֖וֹ בְּקֶ֣רֶב <S%H7130><s%> among אֶחָ֑יו <S%H251><s%> their brethren יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> he נַחֲלָת֔וֹ <S%H5159><s%> [is] their inheritance כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> he דִּבֶּר־ <S%H1696><s%> as he hath said לֽוֹ׃ ס

וְזֶ֡ה <S%H2088><s%> now this יִהְיֶה֩ <S%H1961><s%> become מִשְׁפַּ֨ט <S%H4941><s%> due הַכֹּהֲנִ֜ים <S%H3548><s%> And this shall be the priest's מֵאֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> הָעָ֗ם <S%H5971><s%> from the people מֵאֵ֛ת <S%H853><s%> זֹבְחֵ֥י <S%H2076><s%> from them that offer הַזֶּ֖בַח <S%H2077><s%> a sacrifice אִם־ <S%H518><s%> either שׁ֣וֹר <S%H7794><s%> whether [it be] ox אִם־ <S%H518><s%> or שֶׂ֑ה <S%H7716><s%> or sheep וְנָתַן֙ <S%H5414><s%> and they shall give לַכֹּהֵ֔ן <S%H3548><s%> unto the priest הַזְּרֹ֥עַ <S%H2220><s%> the shoulder וְהַלְּחָיַ֖יִם <S%H3895><s%> and the two cheeks וְהַקֵּבָֽה׃ <S%H6896><s%> and the maw

רֵאשִׁ֨ית <S%H7225><s%> The firstfruit דְּגָֽנְךָ֜ <S%H1715><s%> [also] of thy corn תִּֽירֹשְׁךָ֣ <S%H8492><s%> of thy wine וְיִצְהָרֶ֗ךָ <S%H3323><s%> and of thine oil וְרֵאשִׁ֛ית <S%H7225><s%> and the first גֵּ֥ז <S%H1488><s%> of the fleece צֹאנְךָ֖ <S%H6629><s%> of thy sheep תִּתֶּן־ <S%H5414><s%> shalt thou give לּֽוֹ׃

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for ב֗וֹ בָּחַ֛ר <S%H977><s%> hath chosen יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> For the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all שְׁבָטֶ֑יךָ <S%H7626><s%> him out of all thy tribes לַעֲמֹ֨ד <S%H5975><s%> to stand לְשָׁרֵ֧ת <S%H8334><s%> to minister בְּשֵׁם־ <S%H8034><s%> in the name יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD ה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> him וּבָנָ֖יו <S%H1121><s%> him and his sons כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַיָּמִֽים׃ <S%H3117><s%> for ever ס

וְכִֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> now if יָבֹ֨א <S%H935><s%> come הַלֵּוִ֜י <S%H3881><s%> And if a Levite מֵאַחַ֤ד <S%H259><s%> from any שְׁעָרֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H8179><s%> of thy gates מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> whenever יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> out of all Israel אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he גָּ֣ר <S%H1481><s%> where he sojourned שָׁ֑ם <S%H8033><s%> in it וּבָא֙ <S%H935><s%> and come בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> whenever אַוַּ֣ת <S%H185><s%> with all the desire נַפְשׁ֔וֹ <S%H5315><s%> of his mind אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמָּק֖וֹם <S%H4725><s%> unto the place אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which יִבְחַ֥ר <S%H977><s%> shall choose יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD

וְשֵׁרֵ֕ת <S%H8334><s%> Then he shall minister בְּשֵׁ֖ם <S%H8034><s%> in the name יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹהָ֑יו <S%H430><s%> his God כְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֶחָיו֙ <S%H251><s%> as all his brethren הַלְוִיִּ֔ם <S%H3881><s%> the Levites הָעֹמְדִ֥ים <S%H5975><s%> [do] which stand שָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> there לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> there before יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD

חֵ֥לֶק <S%H2506><s%> They shall have like portions כְּחֵ֖לֶק <S%H2506><s%> portions יֹאכֵ֑לוּ <S%H398><s%> to eat לְבַ֥ד <S%H905><s%> except מִמְכָּרָ֖יו <S%H4465><s%> beside that which cometh of the sale עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> of הָאָבֽוֹת׃ <S%H1><s%> of his patrimony ס

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> When אַתָּה֙ <S%H859><s%> you בָּ֣א <S%H935><s%> When thou art come אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> into the land אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God נֹתֵ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> giveth לָ֑ךְ לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall not תִלְמַ֣ד <S%H3925><s%> thee thou shalt not learn לַעֲשׂ֔וֹת <S%H6213><s%> to do כְּתוֹעֲבֹ֖ת <S%H8441><s%> after the abominations הַגּוֹיִ֥ם <S%H1471><s%> of those nations הָהֵֽם׃ <S%H1992><s%> of those

לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יִמָּצֵ֣א <S%H4672><s%> There shall not be found בְךָ֔ מַעֲבִ֥יר <S%H5674><s%> to pass בְּנֽוֹ־ <S%H1121><s%> among you [any one] that maketh his son וּבִתּ֖וֹ <S%H1323><s%> or his daughter בָּאֵ֑שׁ <S%H784><s%> through the fire קֹסֵ֣ם <S%H7081><s%> divination קְסָמִ֔ים <S%H7080><s%> [or] that useth מְעוֹנֵ֥ן <S%H6049><s%> [or] an observer of times וּמְנַחֵ֖שׁ <S%H5172><s%> or an enchanter וּמְכַשֵּֽׁף׃ <S%H3784><s%> or a witch

וְחֹבֵ֖ר <S%H2266><s%> casts חָ֑בֶר <S%H2267><s%> A spell וְשֹׁאֵ֥ל <S%H7592><s%> or a consulter אוֹב֙ <S%H178><s%> with familiar spirits וְיִדְּעֹנִ֔י <S%H3049><s%> or a wizard וְדֹרֵ֖שׁ <S%H1875><s%> calls אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> up הַמֵּתִֽים׃ <S%H4191><s%> the dead

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for תוֹעֲבַ֥ת <S%H8441><s%> these things [are] an abomination יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> whoever עֹ֣שֵׂה <S%H6213><s%> For all that do אֵ֑לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these וּבִגְלַל֙ <S%H1558><s%> and because הַתּוֹעֵבֹ֣ת <S%H8441><s%> of these abominations הָאֵ֔לֶּה <S%H428><s%> things יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God מוֹרִ֥ישׁ <S%H3423><s%> doth drive them out אוֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> מִפָּנֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H6440><s%> from before
תָּמִ֣ים <S%H8549><s%> Thou shalt be perfect תִּֽהְיֶ֔ה <S%H1961><s%> become עִ֖ם <S%H5973><s%> before יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> with the LORD אֱלֹהֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H430><s%> thy God ס

כִּ֣י ׀ <S%H3588><s%> for הַגּוֹיִ֣ם <S%H1471><s%> For these nations הָאֵ֗לֶּה <S%H428><s%> those אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> which אַתָּה֙ <S%H859><s%> you יוֹרֵ֣שׁ <S%H3423><s%> which thou shalt possess אוֹתָ֔ם <S%H853><s%> אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מְעֹנְנִ֥ים <S%H6049><s%> unto observers of times וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and to קֹסְמִ֖ים <S%H7080><s%> and unto diviners יִשְׁמָ֑עוּ <S%H8085><s%> hearkened וְאַתָּ֕ה <S%H859><s%> you לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not כֵ֔ן <S%H3651><s%> so נָ֥תַן <S%H5414><s%> hath not suffered לְךָ֖ יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> but as for thee the LORD אֱלֹהֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H430><s%> thy God

נָבִ֨יא <S%H5030><s%> unto thee a Prophet מִקִּרְבְּךָ֤ <S%H7130><s%> from the midst מֵאַחֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H251><s%> of thee of thy brethren כָּמֹ֔נִי <S%H3644><s%> like יָקִ֥ים <S%H6965><s%> will raise up לְךָ֖ יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD אֱלֹהֶ֑יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God אֵלָ֖יו <S%H413><s%> about תִּשְׁמָעֽוּן׃ <S%H8085><s%> like unto me unto him ye shall hearken

כְּכֹ֨ל <S%H3605><s%> to all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> you שָׁאַ֜לְתָּ <S%H7592><s%> According to all that thou desiredst מֵעִ֨ם <S%H5973><s%> with יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H430><s%> thy God בְּחֹרֵ֔ב <S%H2722><s%> in Horeb בְּי֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> in the day הַקָּהָ֖ל <S%H6951><s%> of the assembly לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> or אֹסֵ֗ף <S%H3254><s%> again לִשְׁמֹ֙עַ֙ <S%H8085><s%> Let me not hear אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> קוֹל֙ <S%H6963><s%> the voice יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹהָ֔י <S%H430><s%> my God וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאֵ֨שׁ <S%H784><s%> fire הַגְּדֹלָ֥ה <S%H1419><s%> this great הַזֹּ֛את <S%H2063><s%> likewise לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> or אֶרְאֶ֥ה <S%H7200><s%> neither let me see ע֖וֹד <S%H5750><s%> anymore וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> or אָמֽוּת׃ <S%H4191><s%> any more that I die

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֵלָ֑י <S%H413><s%> about הֵיטִ֖יבוּ <S%H3190><s%> unto me They have well אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> they דִּבֵּֽרוּ׃ <S%H1696><s%> [spoken that] which they have spoken

נָבִ֨יא <S%H5030><s%> a Prophet אָקִ֥ים <S%H6965><s%> I will raise them up לָהֶ֛ם <S%H1992><s%> from מִקֶּ֥רֶב <S%H7130><s%> from among אֲחֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H251><s%> their brethren כָּמ֑וֹךָ <S%H3644><s%> like וְנָתַתִּ֤י <S%H5414><s%> like unto thee and will put דְבָרַי֙ <S%H1697><s%> my words בְּפִ֔יו <S%H6310><s%> in his mouth וְדִבֶּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> and he shall speak אֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> about אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> i אֲצַוֶּֽנּוּ׃ <S%H6680><s%> unto them all that I shall command

וְהָיָ֗ה <S%H1961><s%> shall come הָאִישׁ֙ <S%H376><s%> And it shall come to pass [that] whosoever אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> which לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> will not יִשְׁמַע֙ <S%H8085><s%> will not hearken אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to דְּבָרַ֔י <S%H1697><s%> unto my words אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which יְדַבֵּ֖ר <S%H1696><s%> which he shall speak בִּשְׁמִ֑י <S%H8034><s%> in my name אָנֹכִ֖י <S%H595><s%> Myself אֶדְרֹ֥שׁ <S%H1875><s%> I will require מֵעִמּֽוֹ׃ <S%H5973><s%> with

אַ֣ךְ <S%H389><s%> but הַנָּבִ֡יא <S%H5030><s%> But the prophet אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who יָזִיד֩ <S%H2102><s%> which shall presume לְדַבֵּ֨ר <S%H1696><s%> to speak דָּבָ֜ר <S%H1697><s%> a word בִּשְׁמִ֗י <S%H8034><s%> in my name אֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> which לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> have not צִוִּיתִיו֙ <S%H6680><s%> which I have not commanded לְדַבֵּ֔ר <S%H1696><s%> him to speak וַאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which יְדַבֵּ֔ר <S%H1696><s%> or that shall speak בְּשֵׁ֖ם <S%H8034><s%> in the name אֱלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> gods אֲחֵרִ֑ים <S%H312><s%> of other וּמֵ֖ת <S%H4191><s%> shall die הַנָּבִ֥יא <S%H5030><s%> even that prophet הַהֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he

וְכִ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for תֹאמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> And if thou say בִּלְבָבֶ֑ךָ <S%H3824><s%> in thine heart אֵיכָה֙ <S%H349><s%> will we נֵדַ֣ע <S%H3045><s%> How shall we know אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדָּבָ֔ר <S%H1697><s%> the word אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not דִבְּר֖וֹ <S%H1696><s%> hath not spoken יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD

אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> When יְדַבֵּ֨ר <S%H1696><s%> speaketh הַנָּבִ֜יא <S%H5030><s%> When a prophet בְּשֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> in the name יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> does not יִהְיֶ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> come הַדָּבָר֙ <S%H1697><s%> if the thing וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> or יָב֔וֹא <S%H935><s%> follow not nor come to pass ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> that הַדָּבָ֔ר <S%H1697><s%> that [is] the thing אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> has not דִבְּר֖וֹ <S%H1696><s%> hath not spoken יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD בְּזָדוֹן֙ <S%H2087><s%> it presumptuously דִּבְּר֣וֹ <S%H1696><s%> hath spoken הַנָּבִ֔יא <S%H5030><s%> [but] the prophet לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not תָג֖וּר <S%H1481><s%> thou shalt not be afraid מִמֶּֽנּוּ׃ <S%H4480><s%> at ס
